entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Grande-Vallée
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:57 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 this morning. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
